name: The Complete Blinky Bill: a 7 hour 7-CD Audio book
description:
Dorothy Wall's classic tales of the cheeky, adventurous koala and his bush friends, brought to life in more than seven hours of enchanted storytelling!

---FREE SHIPPING! ------

LISTEN TO SAMPLE PASSAGES HERE: 
http://www.divshare.com/playlist/632708-255

Ideal for any child aged 4 to 12. Keep them enthralled during long hours of driving on the school holidays, or let them escape at any time into Blinky's magical bushland together with his friends Snubby, Nutsy, Splodge the Kangaroo, Jacko the Kookaburra, Mr Mouse, Angelina Wallaby, Mr Owl and many many more.

* Hold your breath as Blinky tries to escape from Miss Pimm's shop after stealing all her peppermints!
* Learn how a naughty koala plays leap-frog with frogs!
* Go with Blinky underground to a rabbits' birthday party; where he gets into trouble with Madam Hare.
* Giggle with Blinky as he outwits his Mum Mrs Koala, and her friend Mrs Grunty.
* Listen how Blinky foils plots by Granny Goannna, Mrs Snake and Belinda Fox to gobble up baby possums and rabbits.
* Capture the excitement of Blinky's escape from the zoo, with Splodge!
* Hear Blinky and Nutsy's race, with Mrs Field Mouse, to save Mrs Echidna's life
* Join with Blinky and Nutsy as the pelicans cause a rumpus!

plus many many more adventures. Seven hours and thirteen minutes of irresistible charm and mayhem caused by one mischevious koala. No child should miss out on these classic Australian yarns!

Now you can have these incomparable stories read to you and your children. This audio version is completely faithful to all three of Dorothy Wall's original Blinky Bill books.

* 7 hours, 13 minutes
* 84 tracks
* Seven CDs
* a child-sized contents leaflet
* all character voices
* features a full suite of sound effects and music

Narrated, recorded and produced by me, Shane Sody.
I am a former award-winning radio host, now dedicated to producing quality narrations of the greatest stories ever told. For more about me and my production process, see www.sodyaudio.com/about-me/

name: Robin Hood - a 9-hour, 8-CD audio book
description:
The man: the legend. One of the greatest stories of all time! More than nine-and a half hours of listening.

LISTEN TO FREE SAMPLES HERE:
http://www.divshare.com/playlist/661909-d9f

The story of Robin Hood has been re-told on the big screen, with Russell Crowe and Cate Blachett in the lead roles. However, this audio book is not associated with the movie. It is the classic Robin Hood story, as told by Paul Creswick.

It's all here: the story of how Robin lost his birthright as the King's Ranger at Locksley, his archery feats at Nottingham, the outlaws' war with the Sheriff, Robin's pursuit of Marian, and many tales of bravery, rescue, laughter and rivalry with Little John, Friar Tuck, Allan-a-Dale, Much the Miller, Will Scarlett, and all the others.

Now you can have this incomparable story read to you, in a gripping new-release full stereo audio book. The story is adapted from the Paul Creswick text. It is faithful to the original story, but with the language updated for the 21st century listener. (Listen to the sample passages.)

* 9 hours, 41 minutes
* Eight CD's in two volumes
* a 16-page color booklet featuring illustrations by N.C. Wyeth
* all character voices
* features a full suite of theme music and sound effects
* 35 chapters, divided into 90 audio tracks, making it easy to resume listening at any time
* FREE SHIPPING!

Narrated, recorded and produced by me, Shane Sody.
I am a former award-winning radio host, now dedicated to producing quality narrations of the greatest stories ever told. For more about me, see: www.sodyaudio.com/about-me/

name: Rindercella & Other Totally Twisted Tales: CD Audio Book
description:
The kraziest kollection of nonsense rhymes, tongue twisters and tairy fales ever collected on one CD! You don't have to be krazy to listen to this recording, but it helps!

Narrated by Shane Sody

HEAR FREE SAMPLES AT:
http://www.divshare.com/playlist/632914-d97

This audio book is ideal for children aged 5 to 12. Highlights include:

* hilarious re-tellings of seven famous spoonerised "tairy fales";
* the longest sequence of tongue twisters ever recorded, in a new story about a tongue twister competition;
* includes a 16-page colour booklet featuring the top ten toughest tongue twisters, for kids to try at home!;
* well-loved nonsense rhymes from Lewis Carroll, and a new alphabet of curious rhyming animals - (e.g "A is for Aristotle the Axolotl...")
* all rounded out with two traditional kids songs ("Ain't We Crazy" and "Be Kind to Your Web-footed Friends")
* 1 hour, 15 minutes
* 17 audio tracks
* dozens of character voices
* features a full suite of sound effects and theme music
* FREE SHIPPING!


Narrated, recorded and produced by me, Shane Sody.
I am a former award-winning radio host, now dedicated to producing quality narrations of the greatest stories ever told. For more about me, see: www.sodyaudio.com/about-me/

name: The HG Wells Collection: 4 audio books & eBooks on 2 MP3 CDs
description:
Over 20 hours of listening!

This is a unique collection of four audio books, and four PDF e-books on two MP3 CDs, from the father of science fiction, H.G. Wells.

Nowhere else can you obtain such a high-quality collection of audio book narrations of the greatest science fiction stories of all time!

* The War of the Worlds (5 hrs 55 mins)
* The Time Machine (3 hrs 34 mins)
* The Island of Dr Moreau (5 hrs 07 mins)
* The Invisible Man (5 hrs 49 mins)

Movie-makers have always loved H.G. Wells. Each one of these novels has been turned into a major motion picture, several times each, over many decades.

This audio book collection is:

* 20 hours, 27 minutes
* a total of 195 audio tracks
* two MP3 CDs - 128 Kbps
* all character voices
* full suite of orchestral music themes
* full suite of sound effects on The Time Machine, The Island of Dr Moreau, and The Invisible Man

The CDs also include all four novels as full-length PDF e-Books, for you to read along.

Narrated, recorded and produced by me, Shane Sody.
I am a former award-winning radio host, now dedicated to producing quality narrations of the greatest stories ever told. 
For more about me, visit  www.sodyaudio.com/about-me/


LISTEN TO FREE SAMPLES of The Invisible Man at:
http://www.divshare.com/playlist/632912-02c

name: The Complete Beatrix Potter - 23 audio books & PDF books
description:
23 books in one! More than five hours of listening and reading pleasure. FREE SHIPPING!
LISTEN TO SAMPLE PASSAGES HERE: http://www.divshare.com/playlist/632711-efd

All twenty-three of Beatrix Potter's immortal books lovingly narrated with dozens of endearing and unique character voices; many hundreds of authentic sound effects and original theme music, making each story come alive for you and your child! And also in this collection, all twenty-three of the same stories, to read along from PDF e-books, presented with every single one of Beatrix Potter's original illustrations. Every child deserves the chance to get acquainted with Peter Rabbit, Benjamin Bunny, Jemima Puddleduck and their friends! Watch your child's eyes light up, as he or she: * sees the words and pictures in the PDF e-books; * hears the stories narrated; and also * hears the sounds of: - Peter Rabbit running from Mr McGregor - 'Two Bad Mice' breaking the crockery in Lucinda's dolls' house! - Jemima Puddleduck rescued from the fox, by the growling and barking dogs; ...and many more similar adventures. You can choose to read these stories to your child yourself, from the PDF e-books, or sit back and enjoy the narration with your child, following along, if you wish, with the text. Both the audio books, and the PDF e-books are all completely faithful to all of Beatrix Potter's 23 original stories. The 23 audio books, on 4 CDs, feature: * 5 hours, 13 minutes total running time * all character voices, narrated in full stereo * a full suite of sound effects * 23 different music themes; one theme for each of the 23 books The 23 PDF e-books, on a fifth CD, feature: * All of Beatrix Potter's original full stories * All of Beatrix Potter's original illustrations - 508 in colour and 180 in black and white (as originally published) * Child-size pages, (for printing on A5-size paper, if you wish) * Compatible for screen reading with the i-Pad, the Kindle2, the Nook Color, or any type of computer. Narrated, recorded and produced by me, Shane Sody. I am a former award-winning radio host, now dedicated to producing quality narrations of the greatest stories ever told. For more about me, see: www.sodyaudio.com/about-me/
